description: Develops technical proposals to meet customer solution requirements and provide sales personnel with a competitive bid. Underlines the energy efficiency and environmental impact related to a proposal. Collaborates with colleagues to align the service or product solution with the organisation's capacity to deliver.
title: Sales Proposal Development

levels.2: Organises collaboration between relevant internal departments, for example, technical, sales and legal. Facilitates comparison between customer requirement and available 'off the shelf' solutions.
levels.3: Acts creatively to develop proposal incorporating a complex solution. Customises solution in a complex technical and legal environment and ensures feasibility, legal and technical validity of customer offer.

knowledges.K2: internally adopted sales and marketing techniques
knowledges.K5: product or service unique selling points
knowledges.K6: the different service models (Software as a Service SaaS, Platform-as-a-Service PaaS, Infrastructure as a Service IaaS) and operational translations (e.g. cloud computing)

skills.S3: interpret the terms and conditions of the tender documentation
skills.S4: evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of potential competitors
skills.S5: ensure that a proposal is of high quality and is submitted on time
skills.S6: communicates the energy efficiency and environmental-related aspects of a proposal
skills.S7: ensure that proposals meet compliance requirements
skills.S1: construct the framework for proposal documentation
skills.S2: co-ordinate and facilitate multidisciplinary teams contributing to the proposal
